snippet: Animal rights advocates are demanding that a military college in La Paz fire an instructor who butchered a live dog in class and then smeared its blood on students’ faces.
abstract: Animal rights advocates are demanding that military college in Bolivia fire instructor who butchered a live dog in class; say animals are abused in courses to desensitize soldiers.
lead_paragraph: Animal rights advocates are demanding that a military college in La Paz fire an instructor who butchered a live dog in class and then smeared its blood on students’ faces.

headline.main: Bolivia: Teacher’s Killing of Dog as Lesson Causes an Uproar
headline.print_headline: Bolivia: Teacher’s Killing of Dog as Lesson Causes an Uproar
